text: @realDonaldTrump Nobody knows much about COVID19. We're told we have 2 B profoundly cautious in an unprecedented way, & it's highly contagious. I can see & hear the hopelessness in Fauci's & Birx's eyes & voices. Why is it that I can't get the term "biological warfare" out of my head about this?
